sentence: In the future, Feihe will continue to adhere to its strategic positioning as Smart Babies Drink Feihe.
Besides formula, we will produce premium quality milk powder and fulfill our corporate social responsibilities.

The hazardous waste storehouse custodian of the storage and transportation supply department will sort and place the hazardous waste according to the labels, fill in the Hazardous Waste Entry and Exit Ledger before storing the waste.

The EHS department will entrust a qualified third-party company to transport and dispose of the hazardous waste after the local environment protection bureau handles the hazardous waste disposal forms, and the solid waste will be treated harmlessly on a regular basis.
Subsequently, a dedicated supplier withdrawal team will be established to develop a phased-out plan following a comprehensive evaluation process.
